DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value Progesterone In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Outcome
DOC.criteria: Age < 40 year Basal FSH < 12 IU/L Basal P < 1.6 ng/mL Presence cystic formation ovary basal ultrasound scan ( prior initiation stimulation ) Women polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) Women Stage IIIIV Endometriosis Women pathological condition adrenal gland
